mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 as rn, rno, replyer, content, regdate, seq, updated FROM notice_reply, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) as r WHERE seq = #{seq} AND rno > 0 ORDER BY rno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{cri.amount} ) r WHERE r.rn > 0 ORDER BY r.rn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_reply ( replyer, content, regdate, seq) VALUES ( #{replyer}, #{content}, NOW(), #{seq} )
